jei.animus.antilife.info: Created when lightning strikes Life Essence fluid from Blood Magic. Spreads to adjacent blocks, converting them into AntiLife. When touching Life Essence, spreads as fluid instead.
jei.animus.antilife_block.info: Created by the Sigil of Consumption or when AntiLife fluid touches solid blocks. Spreads to matching adjacent blocks up to the configured range.
jei.animus.crystallized_demon_will_block: Crafted in the Alchemy Table using powerful reagents. Required component for Tier 6 Blood Altars. Acts as a valid CRYSTAL component in altar structures.
guide.animus.name: Codex Animus
guide.animus.landing_text: A comprehensive guide detailing the Animus of the Sanguine Arts

tooltip.animus.rune_unleashed_nature.fla: A hybrid Blood Magic altar rune powered by Botania mana

tooltip.animus.imperfect_ritual_stone.in: Place a block on top and right-click to activate a ritual
ritual.animus.regression.no_item: You must be holding an item to perform this ritual!
ritual.animus.regression.no_cost: This item has no repair cost to remove!
jei.animus.imperfect_ritual_stone.info: Reusable ritual stone. Place a block on top and right-click to activate the ritual effect. Each use costs LP but the stone is not consumed.
jei.animus.imperfect_ritual_stone.regres: §6Ritual of Regression§r: Place a Bookshelf on top. Costs 3000 LP. Removes repair cost from held item.
jei.animus.imperfect_ritual_stone.hunger: §6Ritual of Hunger§r: Place a Bone Block on top. Costs 500 LP. Makes you very hungry.
jei.animus.imperfect_ritual_stone.enhanc: §6Ritual of Enhancement§r: Place an Amethyst Block on top. Costs 5000 LP. Enhances all enchantments on mainhand item by 1 level. Cannot enhance already enhanced items.
jei.animus.imperfect_ritual_stone.reduct: §6Ritual of Reduction§r: Place a Bookshelf on top. Costs 1000 LP. Removes enhanced mark and downgrades all enchantments by 1 level (minimum level 1).
jei.animus.imperfect_ritual_stone.boundl: §6Ritual of Boundless Skies§r: Place Ancient Debris on top. Costs 10000 LP. Grants 10 minutes of creative flight.
ritual.animus.enhancement.no_item: You must be holding an item in your mainhand to perform this ritual!

advancement.animus.sanguine_scroll.title: Sanguine Scroll
advancement.animus.sanguine_scroll.descr: Craft a Sanguine Scroll to cast spells powered by Life Essence
jei.animus.sanguine_scroll.info:
Sanguine Scrolls are reusable spell scrolls powered by Life Essence instead of mana.

§6Crafting:§r Right-click a Blood Altar while holding an Iron's Spellbooks scroll in your main hand and a Blood Magic slate in your offhand. The altar consumes LP based on spell rarity and level.

§6Usage:§r Right-click to cast the stored spell, consuming LP from your Soul Network. Each use damages the scroll's durability.
jei.animus.sanguine_scroll.blank:
§6Blank Sanguine Scroll§r
Uses Blank Slate
50 uses

§cLP Cost:§r Base x Spell Level
Common: 2,000 | Uncommon: 4,000
Rare: 8,000 | Epic: 12,000
Legendary: 16,000

§6Reinforced Sanguine Scroll§r
Uses Reinforced Slate

§cLP Cost:§r Base x Spell Level

Rare: 8,000 | Epic: 12,000
Legendary: 16,000
